title: Web Developer
description:
I created websites based on client needs, always keeping our designs clean, efficient and easy to maintain.

I created tools to help the development process, which saved us time and made projects more consistent.

I participated in organizing how we do documentation and development processes — documenting, improving workflows and ensuring that our work was easy to maintain for other developers.

title: Customer Service Agent
description: Establish daily communication with clients to resolve issues and provide updates on their investments.

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
I worked remotely on all types of projects — landing pages, woocommerce, and multi-page websites.

Meetings with clients to understand their needs and present some options and ideas for the project.

I also helped train new developers, explaining methodologies, languages, architecture models, and experiences with clients, all to help with the development of new team members.

title: Web Developer Internship
description: As a part-time intern, I developed projects independently. I attended several meetings with clients, which allowed me to understand what we should prioritize when discussing a project.
